DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect oral dronabinol tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) withdrawal symptom marijuana dependent volunteer , evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , cardiovascular effect combination oral dronabinol smoke marijuana determine potential significant interaction conduct outpatient study .
DOC.criteria: Must age 18 45 year age Must good general health Must meet DSMIV criterion marijuana dependence non treatment seeker time study Must able provide write informed consent Must able provide 1 marijuana positive urine specimen ( > 50 ng/mL ) within 28day screening period If female child bear potential , must agree use birth control . Exclusion Criteria : Please contact site information .
